thread.section_title: Brumersbikes Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of brumersbikes.co.uk
thread.title: Andy Mittelbach

author: Andy Mittelbach
title: Andy Mittelbach
text: I have been using brumers bikes for many years and always find him very knowledgeable with regard to any problem I have had. He is always happy to help, even small problems get his undivided attention . The parts are always quick to arrive and he only uses quality parts so I know there won't be any problem with them . He even picked up my bike and returned it the same day with no extra charge . What more can I say . I wish every business was this good to deal with , my life would be so much simpler . Keep up the good work .
